title: Cloud Native Maturity Assessment
subtitle: Interactive visualization of the assessment process, modules, and analysis
pageSubtitle: Interactive visualization of the assessment process, modules, and analysis

overview.title: Assessment Process Overview
overview.description: The Cloud Native Maturity Assessment follows a comprehensive process designed to provide organizations with actionable insights for their cloud native journey. The interactive diagrams below illustrate the assessment flow, modules, and analysis components.

instructions.title: How to Use the Interactive Mindmap
instructions.navigate: Use mouse wheel to zoom in/out, drag to pan around the diagram
instructions.explore: Click on tabs to view different aspects of the assessment
instructions.interact: Click on category nodes to expand subcategories and educational details
instructions.controls: Use the controls in the bottom-right to fit view, zoom, or reset

tabDescriptions.assessmentFlow: This diagram shows the entire assessment process flow from start to finish.
tabDescriptions.assessmentModules: Click on any category to see its subcategories. All 15 assessment categories are shown.
tabDescriptions.maturityAnalysis: This diagram shows the maturity analysis framework and key insights provided.

personalization.title: Personalized Assessment Process
personalization.description: The assessment adapts to your organization's specific needs and context, providing relevant questions and insights based on your cloud native maturity level, industry, and priorities.

customization.title: Assessment Customization
customization.description: The assessment is tailored based on:

items.maturityAnalysis: Detailed maturity analysis across 15 key categories

nodes.educationalDetails: Educational details about {{label}}. Click to explore the concepts and principles.
